礛字的基本解释

礛
jiān
〔礛诸〕打磨玉石用的青色磨石，如“玉待礛礛而成器。”
锋利：“被礛磻，引微缴，折清风而抎矣。”

礛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古銜切，平銜，見。］
(1)见“礛”。
(2)鋭利。参见“礛磻”。

礛字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　礛； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页837第48
【廣韻】古銜切【集韻】居銜切，?音監。礛䃴，治玉石靑礪也。【戰國策】被礛磻。本作厱。　又【集韻】盧甘切，音藍。礷省文。詳礷字註。

礛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
礛字的起名意思

暂无。

Bun
Basic explanation of words
Bun
jiān
[Zhu Zhu] Cyan grindstone used to polish jade, such as "Jade is to be made into a jade."
Sharpness: "Be stunned, attract a small amount of payment, break the breeze and squeeze it out."
Bun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" ancient title cut, flat title, see. ]
(1) See "礛".
(2) Good profit. See "磻磻".
Bun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　礛; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 837 Page 48
[Guang Yun] Ancient title cut [Ji Yun] Ju title cut, sound monitor. Zeng Chen, the treatment of jade is also hard. 【Warring States Policy】Be stunned. This is 厱.　[Jiyun] Luganqie, sound blue.礷省文. Detailed note of the word.
Bun
